channel.title: git on bad gateway
channel.description: Recent content in git on bad gateway

item.title: clean up your git
item.description: Have you ever found yourself frantically trying to un-commit some enormous binary file you’ve accidentally checked in to version control? Or perhaps you’ve made the mistake of committing your AWS root credentials?

item.title: backing up wordpress with git
item.description: So I started this blog, and it’s running on a virtual server somewhere in the cloud. What happens if it disappears?
